channel.title: Snowfall (Remastered) - JL Music (ft Moemx) [Dubstep, Ambient]
channel.description:
:spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/1foCWByE9qjGp1RiWhfIiw
iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/snowfall-feat-james-lucien-moemx-single/1442761317
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/jl_official/snowfall-vip
Remastered version of Snowfall, back in the days when I still produced as James Lucien. This collab was a long one in the making with @moemx, so I felt that I really could do a good job in revitalizing the song and updating it and putting a new spin on it. Hope you guys all enjoy the track, I worked really hard on it this time around ^w^
![snowfall800|500x500](upload://hH7kLhbbrrAnRw8822WxKdBONm6.png)
